channel.title: Chinese themed Art
channel.description: Im on a bit of oriental based design at the moment, no idea why anywhere ehre we go :) [IMG]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/1117/chinesethemeclouds.png[/img] Second version [IMG]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/5731/chinesethemecolour.png[/img] neither are finished both will incorporate soemthing to do with the zodiac just have yet to figure out what, any comments/suggetsions? also which one of the two do you prefer EDIT: A version with the chinese tiger incorporated in there [IMG]http://img709.imageshack.us/img709/5825/chinesethemetiger.png[/img]

item.title: Chinese themed Art
item.dc:creator: @Koolvin Koolvin
item.description:
@Koolvin wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:4, topic:334393”]I ADD CHINESE LOOKING SYMBOLS AND SHITTY FADED IMAGES AND I CALL IT CHINESE THEMED

joking, they look pretty cool[/quote]I agree with everything this man has just said…

Read full topic

item.title: Chinese themed Art
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I think you should work on a smaller canvas, way too much empty space and not much of the detail that you’d expect in chinese “art”. Also the symbols are too solid when compared to the rest of the image, they look out of place.

Other than that, very chinese.

Read full topic
